channel.title: [REQ] 135's stats XP. [reQ]
channel.description:
hello moparscape.
i was looking for the xp of the stat 135. i have my own server with 99stats..im the owner and i wanna make my stats 135..
-i---0wn.

item.title: [REQ] 135's stats XP. [reQ]
item.dc:creator: @Jay_Laze .Jay Laze
item.description:
@Jay_Laze wrote:

Check client for spells level etc…
go in player.java to set max stat though

In client you’ll have to edit the the player spell max leveling. like set spells to a different value of 1-99 if your looking forward to 99 skills.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] 135's stats XP. [reQ]
item.dc:creator: @king_enjoi king enjoi
item.description:
@king_enjoi wrote:

to edit your skills go into ‘character’ and click on your name…scroll down till u see ’ [SKILLS]’ replace it with this

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 135 486000000
character-skill = 1 135 486000000
character-skill = 2 135 486000000
character-skill = 3 135 486000000
character-skill = 4 135 486000000
character-skill = 5 135 486000000
character-skill = 6 135 486000000
character-skill = 7 135 486000000
character-skill = 8 135 486000000
character-skill = 9 135 486000000
character-skill = 10 135 486000000
character-skill = 11 135 486000000
character-skill = 12 135 486000000
character-skill = 13 135 486000000
character-skill = 14 135 486000000
character-skill = 15 135 486000000
character-skill = 16 135 486000000
character-skill = 17 135 486000000
character-skill = 18 135 486000000
character-skill = 19 135 486000000
character-skill = 20 135 486000000
character-skill = 21 135 486000000
character-skill = 22 135 486000000
character-skill = 23 135 486000000
character-skill = 24 135 486000000

and if u want a command put this after a ’ } ’

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(486000000, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);
addSkillXP(486000000, 5);
addSkillXP(486000000, 6);
addSkillXP(486000000, 7);
addSkillXP(486000000, 8);
addSkillXP(486000000, 9);
addSkillXP(486000000, 10);
addSkillXP(486000000, 11);
addSkillXP(486000000, 12);
addSkillXP(486000000, 13);
addSkillXP(486000000, 14);
addSkillXP(486000000, 15);
addSkillXP(486000000, 16);
addSkillXP(486000000, 17);
addSkillXP(486000000, 18);
addSkillXP(486000000, 19);
addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
addSummonXP(886000000);
addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“YOU B MAXED OUT LIKE A BITCH!!! (go own some noobs).”);
}

just incase some n00b is pissing me off…ill p0t up and own his ass.

THX BTW THO

item.title: [REQ] 135's stats XP. [reQ]
item.dc:creator: @Omg_a_bk Omg a bk
item.description:
@Omg_a_bk wrote:

just search (in player.java)

getLevelForXP

and change

for(i = 0; i <= 99; i++)

to

for(i = 0; i <= 135; i++)

edit: double checked, yeah that should work

Read full topic
